name: POGO JUMP!
description:
Welcome to "Pogo Jump!" where you will play a platformer game with ONLY ONE BUTTON: The right arrow. 

Enjoy the game and let us know your thoughts on the comment below :)

***

Huff.. huff.. it's 1.5 hours before the deadline. We are grateful that we can submit the project while there's blackout for 7 hours during the productive hours T.T

We are saved by using art assets mostly from www.kenney.nl (Kenney Vleugels) - thank you very much!
